Plot: In 1939, WBN, a fourth radio network, is about to take to America's airwaves. As if the confusion of the premiere night wasn't enough, Penny Henderson, the owner's secretary, must deal with...
Title: Radioland Murders
Writer: George Lucas (story), Willard Huyck (screenplay), Gloria Katz (screenplay), Jeff Reno (screenplay), Ron Osborn (screenplay)
Actors: Brian Benben, Mary Stuart Masterson, Ned Beatty, George Burns
